          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10463276">
          <div id="boxatt10463276" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12725463">
              <a id="link_12725463" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/ammusic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725463,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725463});">
               American Music
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link13960560">
              <a id="link_13960560" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/globalpop" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13960560,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13960560});">
               Global Pop
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12725472">
              <a id="link_12725472" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/musichistoryone" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725472,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725472});">
               Music History I
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12725482">
              <a id="link_12725482" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/musichistorytwo" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725482,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725482});">
               Music History II
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link21847546">
              <a id="link_21847546" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/danube" target="_blank" onclick="hit(21847546,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 21847546});">
               Music of Blue Danube
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>

          <h2>
           Search Google Scholar for Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_20" id="content10101170">
          <div id="boxatt10101170" class="boxatt">
           <label for="searchText10101170">
            <img alt="Google Scholar Logo" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/google_scholar.jpg" />
           </label>
           <br />
           <input type="text" value="" id="searchText10101170" class="google_search_box" title="Google scholar search" />
           <br />
           <input type="button" onclick="var queryString = document.getElementById('searchText10101170').value;queryString = queryString.replace(/\\+/g, '+');var url = 'http://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=' + queryString;window.open(url,'GScholar');" value="Search" />
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21489546">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21489546">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21489546">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Recordings and Scores
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21489546">
          <div id="boxatt21489546" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24985552">
              <a id="link_24985552" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://muhlenberg.NaxosMusicLibrary.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985552,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 17562718}); ">
               Naxos Music Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Naxos Music Library is the most comprehensive collection of classical music available online offering over 1,252,200 tracks* of Classical music, Jazz, World, Folk and Chinese music. It includes the complete BIS, Chandos, Hänssler, Hungaroton, Marco Polo, Naxos, Ondine and selected titles of other leading independent labels. Here is a
               <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/library/guides/libinst/music/Naxos.pdf">
                guide
               </a>
               to using Naxos.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25230501">
              <a id="link_25230501" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.alexanderstreet.com/opiv" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25230501,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20911648}); ">
               Music Online: Opera in Video
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Several hundred hours of the most important opera performances, captured on video through staged productions, interviews, and documentaries. Selections represent the world’s best performers, conductors, and opera houses and are based on a work’s importance to the operatic canon.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24985555">
              <a id="link_24985555" href="http://imslp.org/wiki/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24985555,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725967}); ">
               Petrucci Music Library
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A free website containing thousands of "public domain" music scores, compiled by the International Music Score Library Project (IMSLP).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10463277">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10463277">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10463277">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Core Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10463277">
          <div id="boxatt10463277" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12717587">
              <a id="link_12717587" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717587,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717587}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Includes over 80 journals specific to the study of music.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717586">
              <a id="link_12717586" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=https://muse.jhu.edu/browse" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717586,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717586}); ">
               Project MUSE
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A full-text database specializing in journals in the humanities.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12726054">
              <a id="link_12726054" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12726054,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12726054}); ">
               RILM Abstract of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly and popular literature in musicology, ethnomusicology, dance, and other music-related disciplines. Links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10463278">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10463278">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10463278">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           More Databases
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10463278">
          <div id="boxatt10463278" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12717591">
              <a id="link_12717591" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717591,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717592">
              <a id="link_12717592" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717592,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717589">
              <a id="link_12717589" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717589,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717589}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical literature for all regions excluding the U.S. and Canada, 1450-present. Numerous links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23698350">
              <a id="link_23698350" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23698350,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and professional journals and books in psychology and related areas.  Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717593">
              <a id="link_12717593" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rih" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717593,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717593}); ">
               RILM Abstracts of Music Literature
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to scholarly and popular literature in musicology, ethnomusicology, dance, and other music-related disciplines, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19886523">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19886523">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19886523">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Performance Reviews
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19886523">
          <div id="boxatt19886523" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23218047">
              <a id="link_23218047" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23218047,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23218043">
              <a id="link_23218043" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search/?searchtype=t&amp;SORT=D&amp;searcharg=new+york+times+online" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23218043,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016926}); ">
               New York Times Index Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23218044">
              <a id="link_23218044" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23218044,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Databases'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12765628}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
